headline: Impossible Foods Launches Plant-Based Sausage Made with Precision-Fermented Myoglobin
summary: Impossible Foods introduces a new plant-based sausage using precision-fermented myoglobin for a more authentic meat flavor.

headline: Bio-Techne Debuts XF Leather-Like Vegan Material Created via Microbial Fermentation
summary: Bio-Techne announces the launch of XF leather-like material created through microbial fermentation, offering a sustainable alternative to traditional leather.

headline: Perfect Day Foods Scales up Production of Animal-Free Casein with $350M in Series D Funding
summary: Perfect Day Foods secures $350M in Series D funding to increase production of its animal-free casein protein for use in dairy products.

headline: MycoWorks Collaborates with LVMH to Develop Scalable, Sustainable Mycelium Leather
summary: MycoWorks partners with LVMH to develop scalable, sustainable mycelium leather as a replacement for traditional animal-derived leather.

headline: Memphis Meats Announces Chicken Made from Cultivated Animal Cells
summary: Memphis Meats unveils its latest innovation, cultivated chicken made from animal cells, reducing the need for factory farming.

headline: Bolt Threads Introduces Microsilk, a Sustainable, Plant-Based Silk Alternative
summary: Bolt Threads introduces Microsilk, a sustainable and plant-based silk alternative that helps reduce the demand for traditional silk farming.
